description.value:
Requirements You have a foe @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed].

You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away in imitation of the techniques of your rival, Ran-To. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Thrash]. During this Thrash, your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Collateral Thrash] feat applies to all foes adjacent to you. You can then throw the grabbed creature 10 feet, where they fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

If the foe you choose for Collateral Thrash is also adjacent to you, they attempt only one save and take the damage only once.
